fissmap¶

fisspy.map.fissmap(data0, header0, pre_align=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Make sunpy.map.Map for given data and header.

Parameters:
  • data0 (ndarray) – 2 dimensional image.
  • header0 (astropy.io.fits.Header) –

    FTS file header.

    It must has the wcs informations.

  • pre_align (bool) – If False, data0 is aligned with its wcs information.
  • kwargs –

    plot_setting keyword arguments.

    See : sunpy.map
Returns:

fmap – Map class.
Return type:

sunpy.map.GenericMap

See also

fisspy.image.coalignment.match_wcs()
The routine to match wcs information of FISS data with SDO

Notes

The header0 must has the infromations of the coalignment for FISS with SDO.

Warning

This code use the SunPy Map structure, but it may has errors since sunpy is the developing package.

References

SunPy.

SunPy docs.

sunpy.map.Map.

Example

from fisspy.io import read
from fisspy.map.map_factory import fissmap
import fisspy.data.smaple
raster=read.raster(fisspy.data.smaple.FISS_IMAGE,0,smooth=True)
header=read.getheader(fisspy.data.smaple.FISS_IMAGE)
fmap=fissmap(raster,header)
fmap.peek()

(Source code, png, hires.png, pdf)
